gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Particulate constituents of a compound material do not adhere to each other strongly enough that the aggregate can be considered a solid in its own right.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Unconsolidated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Unconsolidated
Unconsolidated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Easily indented with fingers. Relative density 0.0-0.2 (NADMSLTTs 2004 after Bowles, 1984).
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Unconsolidated_very_loose
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Unconsolidated, very loose
Unconsolidated, very loose

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Easily shoveled, can be indented with fingers. Relative density 0.2-0.4 (NADMSLTTs 2004, after Bowles, 1984, slightly modified by SMR).
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Unconsolidated_loose
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Unconsolidated, loose
Unconsolidated, loose

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Shoveled with difficulty. relative density 0.4 - 0.7 (NADMSLTTs 2004, after Bowles, 1984).
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Incipient_consolidation
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Incipient consolidation
Incipient consolidation

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Particulate constituents of a compound material adhere to each other strongly enough that the aggregate can be considered a solid material in its own right.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Consolidated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Consolidated
Consolidated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Requires pick to loosen for shoveling. relative density 0.7-0.9 (NADMSLTTs 2004 after Bowles, 1984).
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Well_consolidated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Well consolidated
Well consolidated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Requires blasting or heavy equipment to loosen. Relative density 0.9-1.0 (NADM SLTTs 2004 after Bowles, 1984). Synonomous with lithified. Rings to blow of hammer.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Indurated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Indurated
Indurated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Rock can be broken with single blow from standard rock hammer (less than 1 kg mass).
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Slightly_indurated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Slightly indurated
Slightly indurated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Multiple blows with standard rock hammer (less than 1 kg) are required to break rock.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Moderately_indurated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Moderately indurated
Moderately indurated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Particles in the rock are strongly bound together such that rock surface can only be broken with great difficulty using standard rock hammer (less than 1 kg mass).
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Well_indurated
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Well indurated
Well indurated

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Material is lithified, but induration varies at scale of description.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Variable_induration
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Variable induration
Variable induration

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: Consolidation ranges from unconsolidated to indurated on scale of description
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Consolidation_variable
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Consolidation variable
Consolidation variable

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: In normative descriptions, indicates that consolidation state is not a determining factor in identification, it may have any value.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Consolidation_not_specified
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Consolidation not specified
Consolidation not specified

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: No data provided to specify consolidation state.
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Consolidation_state_unknown
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Consolidation state unknown
Consolidation state unknown

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: no data because none are available
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ConsolidationDegree:2008:Not_Available
gsml:ControlledConcept.gsml:name: Not Available
Not Available
